modleR 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started

Reference

The workflow

Setup data

setup_sdmdata()

Prepares the dataset to perform ENM

create_buffer()

Samples pseudoabsences inside a geographic or environmental buffer

Fit and project models

do_any() do_many()

Ecological niche models fit, prediction, projection and evaluation using one or several algorithms

Join individual partitions

final_model()

Joins ENM from several partitions, creating a model per algorithm

Create ensemble models

ensemble_model()

Creates ensemble models from several algorithms

Example datasets

example_occs

Ocurrence points for four species in the Brazilian Atlantic Forest

example_vars

Predictor variables

example_mask

Example mask for cropping the partition models

modleR

modleR: A workflow to perform ecological niche modeling

Contents
